name: World of Warcraft World Map Object
summary: Learn about .WMO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Root files list textures (.BLP files), materials, models (.M2 files), groups, and other data. Group files contain the actual 3D model data for a single unit in the WMO.

description: File format used to store 3D object data for World of Warcraft, an online multiplayer adventure game; commonly referred to as a "world map object" or WMO; may be saved as a root file or a group file.
